column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had such a great time at Jinya! Not only was the food excellent
column2: but the atmosphere was fun and trendy. It has long communal tables
column4: and a full bar with a few seats as well. As for food
column5: I ordered the Tokyo Yatai Ramen
column6: and I was shocked by the sheer amount of food. I was full after just a few bites
column7: but maybe that's because it was packed with protein (chicken
column9: and a steamed egg) as well as noodles (duh) and a delicious broth. I'm definitely looking forward to eating my leftovers! I also tried the creamy shrimp tempura for an appetizer
column10: and it was fantastic--the flavor of the spicy mayo on the shrimp was addicting.
